findings.rationale: The two-year limitation on confidentiality obligations may expose parties to risks if sensitive information is disclosed after this period.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidentiality obligations shall continue for two (2) years after termination of discussions.

findings.rationale: The broad definition may lead to ambiguity and disputes regarding what constitutes confidential information, which can increase the risk of unintended disclosures.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all proprietary information disclosed by one party to the other.

findings.rationale: The absence of specified remedies for breach of confidentiality may leave parties vulnerable and unclear on the consequences of violations.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party agrees to: Maintain strict confidentiality.
